page.title: 03LIVING IN UPLOWMAN
page.content: I like living in the country because you can go for quiet walks,ride horses and see more flowers and insects than in the town.I do not like living in the country because you might have to travel to do the shopping and you might be lonely.The schools in the town seem so much bigger,there for they have more teachers to teach the children. On the second Saturday of July there is usually a show at Uplowman.At this show there is a gymkhana,show jumping, clay pigeon shooting,dog show,a goat show and also there are classes to enter for children and adults and and also there are refreshments,to get in it costs i 15p for children and 30p for adults that is if you are not entering anything,it lasts a day.
